cbc.name: CBC/Radio-Canada
cbc.about: Canada's national public broadcaster offering TV, radio, and digital news in English and French.

bell.name: Bell Media
bell.about: A major multimedia company operating CTV, BNN Bloomberg, radio stations, and digital platforms.

rogers.name: Rogers Sports & Media
rogers.about: Owns Citytv, OMNI, and radio stations; part of Rogers Communications.

corus.name: Corus Entertainment
corus.about: Parent company of Global News and specialty TV channels; controlled by the Shaw family.

postmedia.name: Postmedia Network
postmedia.about: Owns dozens of major newspapers across Canada; majority-owned by U.S. hedge funds.

torstar.name: Torstar Corporation
torstar.about: Publisher of the Toronto Star and numerous community newspapers.

quebecor.name: Quebecor Media
quebecor.about: Media and telecommunications company in Québec; owns Journal de Montréal and TVA.

glacier.name: Glacier Media
glacier.about: Publishes regional newspapers in British Columbia and Western Canada.

blackpress.name: Black Press
blackpress.about: One of the largest independent local news publishers in Western Canada and parts of the U.S.

saltwire.name: SaltWire Network
saltwire.about: Atlantic Canada's largest media group, publishing newspapers like the Chronicle Herald.

fp.name: FP Canadian Newspapers
fp.about: Publisher of the Winnipeg Free Press and Brandon Sun in Manitoba.
fp.founder: William Fisher Luxton and John A. Kenny

continental.name: Continental Newspapers
continental.about: A publisher of regional daily newspapers in British Columbia and Ontario.

village.name: Village Media
village.about: Owns hyperlocal online news sites across Ontario and Alberta.

gmi.name: Gonez Media Inc. (GMI)
gmi.about: A digital media company founded by Brandon Gonez.

cn2i.name: Coopérative nationale de l'information indépendante (CN2i)
cn2i.about: A cooperative of six major French-language newspapers in Québec.

gravite.name: Gravité Média
gravite.about: Publisher of community newspapers in Greater Montréal.

brunswick.name: Brunswick News Inc.
brunswick.about: New Brunswick news group, formerly owned by the Irving family.

lapresse.name: La Presse
lapresse.about: Independent French-language digital news outlet based in Montréal.

ledevoir.name: Le Devoir
ledevoir.about: Independent French-language newspaper focused on analysis and editorial rigor.

canindia.name: World Media Corp (Canada) Inc.
canindia.about: Publishes CanIndia News for the South Asian diaspora in Canada.

koreatimes.name: The Korea Times & Hankook Ilbo (Canada) Ltd.
koreatimes.about: Korean-language newspaper serving Canada's Korean community; affiliated with its Korean parent company.

metroland.name: Metroland Media Group
metroland.about: Regional publisher in Ontario known for local papers like Guelph Mercury and others.
metroland.founder: Formed through the merger of Metrospan Community Newspapers and Inland Publishing Company

narwhal.name: The Narwhal
narwhal.about: Non-profit environmental investigative journalism outlet in Canada.

walrus.name: The Walrus
walrus.about: Independent Canadian magazine covering current affairs, culture, and ideas.

pressprogress.name: PressProgress
pressprogress.about: Investigative journalism project of the Broadbent Institute focused on progressive issues in Canada.

ipolitics.name: iPolitics
ipolitics.about: Political news site providing in-depth coverage of Canadian federal politics and policy.

breachmedia.name: The Breach
breachmedia.about: Canadian independent media outlet producing investigative journalism and critical commentary.

citynews.name: CityNews
citynews.about: A local news brand operated by Rogers Sports & Media in multiple Canadian cities.

tvo.name: TVOntario
tvo.about: Ontario's public educational media organization, providing news and documentary content.

ammsa.name: Aboriginal Multi-Media Society (AMMSA)
ammsa.about: Publishes Windspeaker and other Indigenous-focused news outlets in Canada.

cultmtl.name: Cult MTL
cultmtl.about: Cult MTL is an English-language alternative media outlet in Montreal focused on culture and city life.
cultmtl.founder: Former staff of the Montreal Mirror

goldenwest.name: Golden West Broadcasting Ltd.
goldenwest.about: Golden West Broadcasting Ltd. is a Canadian radio and digital media company based in Altona, Manitoba. It is the largest independent radio broadcaster in Canada, primarily operating small-market radio stations and internet portals in the Prairie provinces of Alberta, Saskatchewan, and Manitoba.

itwc.name: IT World Canada (ITWC)
itwc.about: Since its launch in 1984, IT World Canada has become the online information resource of choice for Canadian IT professionals. The company delivers timely, incisive information that helps IT executives and professionals succeed in their jobs.

cartt.name: Cartt.ca
cartt.about: Cartt.ca is an independent trade publication covering the Canadian cable, radio, television, and telecom industries. It provides news, analysis, and opinion pieces relevant to professionals in these sectors.

hilltimes.name: The Hill Times
hilltimes.about: The Hill Times is a Canadian newspaper that covers politics, government affairs, and federal public policy. Based in Ottawa, it provides news and analysis for policymakers, political professionals, and the general public.

mingpao.name: Ming Pao Newspapers (Canada) Ltd.
mingpao.about: Ming Pao is a Chinese-language daily newspaper in Canada affiliated with its Hong Kong-based parent company. It serves the Chinese-speaking community with news coverage on local, national, and international events.

singtao.name: Sing Tao Media Group Canada
singtao.about: Sing Tao Daily is a Chinese-language newspaper serving Canada's Chinese community. It is affiliated with its Hong Kong-based parent company and covers a range of topics including news, entertainment, and lifestyle.

stir.name: Stir
stir.about: Stir is an arts and culture news organization focused on Canadian creators and performances. It covers a wide range of topics including music, film, theatre, and visual arts.

turtleisland.name: Turtle Island News
turtleisland.about: Turtle Island News is an independent Indigenous-owned newspaper based on the Six Nations of the Grand River. It covers Indigenous news and issues across Canada.

nnsl.name: Northern News Services Ltd.
nnsl.about: Northern News Services Ltd. publishes community newspapers in the Northwest Territories and Nunavut, providing news coverage for northern communities.

nnbc.name: Northern Native Broadcasting (CFNR)
nnbc.about: Northern Native Broadcasting operates CFNR-FM, an Indigenous-owned broadcaster serving Northern British Columbia with a mix of music, news, and cultural programming.

whitepine.name: White Pine Media
whitepine.about: White Pine Media is a Canadian media company specializing in video production and digital storytelling.

narcitymedia.name: Narcity Media
narcitymedia.about: Narcity Media is a leading digital media publisher targeting millennials and Gen Z audiences, covering local news, travel, and lifestyle content across North America.

haligonia.name: Haligonia.ca
haligonia.about: Haligonia.ca is a Halifax-based hyperlocal media platform that distributes municipal press releases, emergency alerts, and government updates, focusing on amplifying official community communications.

pattison.name: Pattison Media
pattison.about: Pattison Media, formerly known as Jim Pattison Broadcast Group, is one of Canada's premier radio and television companies. With over 90 years of broadcasting expertise, it operates numerous radio and television stations across British Columbia, Alberta, Saskatchewan, and Manitoba, serving the needs of listeners, viewers, advertisers, and communities.

independent.name: Independent
independent.about: Used for standalone or community outlets not owned by any major group.
